description: A simple and interactive dice rolling simulator. Press the button to roll the dice and get a random number from 1 to 6.

title: Data Visualization
description: A web application that visualizes data using interactive charts and graphs. Users can upload datasets and explore trends through various visualization types.

title: Study Planer
description: A web application that helps users create and manage their study schedules effectively. Users can add subjects, set study goals, and track their progress over time.

title: Advanced Text Case Convertor
description: A web application that allows users to convert text into various cases such as uppercase, lowercase, title case, sentence case, and toggle case with additional features like live preview and undo history.

title: Tab Organizer

title: Word Twist Challenge
description: A fun and engaging word twist game where players create as many words as possible from a given set of letters within a time limit. Features scoring, hints, and a leaderboard.

description: A quantum physics-inspired dice roller that simulates entangled dice, superposition collapse, and explores probability distributions with interactive quantum mechanics visualizations.

title: Mini Geo Guesser
description: A fun geography game where players guess locations based on images and clues, testing their knowledge of world geography.

title: Date Based Note Taking App
description: A private, browser-based diary application that lets users write, edit, search, and manage daily entries. Entries are stored securely in localStorage with a clean calendar-based and list-based view for easy navigation.

title: Focus Timer
description: A productivity-focused timer that allows users to set custom focus and break durations, control the timer with start, pause, and reset actions, and track completed focus sessions to build consistent work habits.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: A web app that visually demonstrates various sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort with adjustable speed and array size for educational purposes.

title: CodeCanvas Editor
description: A browser-based code editor with live preview for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include syntax highlighting, code snippet saving, multiple themes, auto-run, and responsive design. All data stored locally in browser.

title: VerboMemory
description: An interactive word memory game that challenges players to recall words after a brief display. Improve focus, memory, and vocabulary in a fun way.

title: Settings page Simulator
description: A responsive settings page simulator with theme toggle, language selection, and notification preferences. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a seamless user experience.

title: Finance Tracker
description: A simple and interactive personal finance app that allows users to track income and expenses, automatically calculates totals, and shows monthly balance. Perfect for managing budgets efficiently.

description: Pino

title: Number Challenge
description: A fun and challenging number memory game where players memorize a sequence of numbers and recall them correctly within a limited time. Boosts focus, memory, and concentration.

title: Todo List
description: A simple and interactive To-Do List application that allows users to add, manage, and track their daily tasks with ease.

title: Neno Snake Arena
description: A classic snake game where players control a snake to eat food, grow longer, and avoid collisions. Features increasing speed and score tracking for added challenge.

description: A modern file upload feature with image, PDF, and document support. Users can preview files, view file size, and remove files before submission. Includes file type and size validation for a seamless experience.

description: A daily Scrabble-style word puzzle where players create as many valid words as possible from a given set of letters. Boost vocabulary, spelling, and problem-solving skills.

description: A daily Scrabble-style word puzzle where players create as many valid words as possible from a given set of letters. Boost vocabulary, spelling, and problem-solving skills.

title: Daily Planner
description: A simple and user-friendly daily planner that allows users to create, manage, and track tasks for a single day. It supports marking tasks as completed or pending and provides a one-click daily reset for a fresh start, helping users practice basic CRUD operations and frontend state management.

title: Movie Drawing Guess Game 🎬🎨
description: A Pictionary-style game where players draw a movie and others guess it.

description: An interactive machine learning visualization built with vanilla JavaScript. Features a custom matrix math engine, real-time training visualization, and architecture configuration to demonstrate neural network internals without external libraries.

description: An interactive educational tool to visualize complex authentication flows (Session, JWT, OAuth) and security attacks (Replay, Expiry, Tampering). Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JS.

title: DroidOS

title: Blockforge
description: A system-level web application that models Bitcoin mining behavior, miner competition, difficulty adjustment, and energy economics using probabilistic logic instead of real cryptographic hashing.

description: A professional-grade pixel art animation studio in the browser. Features a multi-track timeline sequencer, customizable onion skinning engine, advanced drawing tools, and sprite sheet export capabilities.

title: ClipStream – Non-Linear Editor
description: A browser-based non-linear video editing interface built with Vanilla JavaScript. Features a multi-track magnetic timeline, playhead synchronization engine, keyframe graph editor, and project serialization.

description: A browser-based non-linear video editing interface built with Vanilla JavaScript. Features a multi-track magnetic timeline, playhead synchronization engine, keyframe graph editor, and project serialization.

title: Typing Words Arcade Game
description: A retro-style typing game where words fall from the top of the screen and players must type them correctly before they reach the bottom, featuring scoring, combos, and increasing difficulty.

description: A Flappy Bird–style retro arcade game featuring gravity-based movement, keyboard-controlled jumps, random pipe generation, and distance-based scoring built using HTML Canvas.

description: A grid-based retro maze game where players collect items, avoid enemies, and score points using keyboard controls, inspired by classic Pac-Man-style gameplay.

description: An interactive simulation that demonstrates instinct-based decision making, showing how simple reactive rules can produce complex behavior.

description: A micro FPS game with basic shooting mechanics, enemy AI, and scoring.

description: A JavaScript library for creating guitar tablatures with an easy-to-use structure.

title: Rhythm Tapper
description: A simple rhythm-timing game where you tap notes on the beat for a streak score. Falling notes; tap on beat; streak multiplier. Keyboard or click input.

title: Color Match Rush
description: A timed color-matching puzzler where you swap tiles to match 3-in-a-row with cascading matches under timer pressure. Mouse/touch drag input.

title: trafficjs
description: A JavaScript library for creating traffic animations. It provides a simple and intuitive way to define and work with traffic animations in your JavaScript applications.

description: A JavaScript library for creating piano sheet music. It provides a simple and intuitive way to define and work with piano sheet music in your JavaScript applications.

title: Tower Defense Mini
description: A bite-sized tower defense game where you place turrets to stop creeps on a short path. Features few turret types, short waves, and upgrade paths. Mouse build/upgrade controls.

description: A bite-sized tower defense game where you place turrets to stop creeps on a short path. Features few turret types, short waves, and upgrade paths. Mouse build/upgrade controls.

title: Word Sprint
description: A fast-paced typing speed mini-game where players must type words quickly before the timer drains. Features word queue, time refill on correct answers, streak bonuses, and real-time WPM tracking.

title: Shape Shooter
description: A twin-stick-lite survival game where you rotate and shoot incoming shapes. Survive escalating waves with keyboard movement and mouse aiming, collect power-ups to enhance your abilities.

title: Balloon Rise
description: Guide a balloon upward in this vertical scroller with gentle physics. Hold space or tap to rise, use arrow keys to drift laterally, and avoid spikes and wind gusts while reaching new heights.

title: phantomjs
description: A JavaScript library for creating phantom animations. It provides a simple and intuitive way to define and work with phantom animations in your JavaScript applications.

description: A retro-styled Snake game with pixel graphics, keyboard controls, and progressive difficulty. Inspired by classic Nokia Snake games with modern HTML5 Canvas implementation.

description: A creative drawing challenge where users must create artwork on a canvas without lifting the mouse at any point. Features timer, scoring system, and animated replay of the drawing path.

title: javalitejs
description: A JavaScript library for creating java-like classes and objects. It provides a simple and intuitive way to define and work with java-like classes and objects in your JavaScript applications.
title: Livetypingaura
description: A live typing game where users must type a sentence as fast and accurately as possible. Features timer, scoring system, and typing accuracy calculation.

author.description: Grind and jump across floating rails high above the clouds in this fast-paced 3D game. Auto-grind rails, manual jumps, mid-air tricks for score.
